ygData.subject: Epic quest update
ygData.msgSnippet: Man I m so excited!  I m SOOOOOOO close to finishing my druid epic!  I have exactly 2 more kills and I ll have it!  My druid is level 56 now and working on his
ygData.messageBody:
Man I'm so excited!  I'm SOOOOOOO close to finishing my druid epic!  I have exactly 2 more kills and I'll have it!  My druid is level 56 now and working on his 4th AA point (yeah I know...  but they say they come faster after 60). The last two kills I have to finish the quest are the dragon Faydedar and the Corrupted Seahorse.  Faydedar will probably happen first since The Fabled Estrella seems to be roaming the area where the Corrupted Seahorse spawns.  We tried that once already and she conned red to a level 65 beastlord with me.  She used him as a footrug hitting him at 1500 a whack.  So either gonna have to wait until the Fableds are past history or else get up one serious uber guild raid to take her down.   I want to have the epic done before I hit 57 so I'm working on AA xp until then.  I've also been stock piling a lot of my upper level spells as I see them drop or for sale cheap in the bazaar. I dont have them all yet but I got a few for each level up to 62 so it gives me somethign to look forward to.  Anyway.... it's getting ever closer then I'll be epic druid!  hehehe :)
 
 
Raido Covenfall
56 ELF DRU
Cazic Thule server
